mapper.insert: insert into sys_dic (index_id, code_, code_text, sort_no, editable_, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_dic set index_id = #{indexId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code_ = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_text = #{codeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, editable_ = #{editable,jdbcType=BIT}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, index_id, code_, code_text, sort_no, editable_, enable_, remark_, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_dic where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
